metadata.name: Ivan the Terrible and His Son Ivan
metadata.description:
Recreating the painting of Ilya Repin with different types of microorganisms.

Painting with Bacteria and Yeast on Agar in 15 Cm Petri Dish.
This style of art is unique because after a short time microorganisms will continue to grow and cover the plate and would disappear and just the capturing pictures will remain.
